title: Valorant Tournament
content:
This is our very first competition!!
Here's your chance to win big with no risk to your wallet.

Date : 7 & 8 of Jan
Refer to https://reload-gaming.com/tournament/register for more details.

comments.body:
Just a year before COVID we had a Pubg tournament too...there was so little connectivity back then in those rooms of B block , more than half of us died because of lag. Still don't know who won, if if it even concluded. 
Also make sure to get everyone registered beforehand.
Yeahh, we know about this tournament. But don’t worry, this is a completely different tournament conducted under different conditions! Do register!
Is this conducted by a club in our college or is it by an independent party?
its hosted by an independent party!
